Attribute Management.name: Attribute Categories
Attribute Management.description: All active attribute categories with Code, Name and Description
Attribute Management.query: SELECT Name, Description, Code FROM AttributeCategory WHERE Code != null

Attribute Management.name: Attribute Picklists
Attribute Management.description: Active picklists used for attribute values
Attribute Management.query: SELECT Name, Description, DataType, Status FROM AttributePicklist WHERE Status = 'Active' AND Name != null

Attribute Management.name: Attribute Picklist Values
Attribute Management.description: All active picklist values with codes, display values, sequence and default flags
Attribute Management.query: SELECT Name, Picklist.Name, Abbreviation, Status, Code, DisplayValue, IsDefault, Sequence, Value FROM AttributePicklistValue WHERE Status = 'Active' AND Code != null

Attribute Management.name: Attribute Definitions
Attribute Management.description: Full attribute metadata including data type, UoM, picklist, required flags, etc.
Attribute Management.query: SELECT Name, UnitOfMeasure.Name, Label, Description, DataType, IsActive, IsRequired, DefaultValue, SourceSystemIdentifier, ValueDescription, Picklist.Name, DefaultHelpText, Code, DeveloperName FROM AttributeDefinition

Attribute Management.name: Category ↔ Attribute Mapping
Attribute Management.description: Links between Attribute Categories and Attribute Definitions

Product Classification.name: Product Classifications
Product Classification.query: SELECT Name, Code, Status FROM ProductClassification

Product Classification.name: Classification Attributes
Product Classification.description: Attributes assigned to product classifications (with sequence, required, hidden, etc.)
Product Classification.query: SELECT Name, AttributeCategory.Code, AttributeDefinition.Code, ProductClassification.Code, Description, ValueDescription, HelpText, IsHidden, IsReadOnly, IsRequired, Status, Sequence, AttributeNameOverride, DefaultValue, DisplayType, IsPriceImpacting, MinimumValue, MaximumValue, MinimumCharacterCount, MaximumCharacterCount, StepValue FROM ProductClassificationAttr

Products & Bundles.name: Products (Product2)
Products & Bundles.description: All products with SKU, family, classification, dates, and bundle flags
Products & Bundles.query: SELECT StockKeepingUnit, Name, ProductCode, Description, IsActive, Family, ExternalDataSourceId, ExternalId, DisplayUrl, QuantityUnitOfMeasure, Type, AvailabilityDate, DiscontinuedDate, BasedOn.Code, EndOfLifeDate, HelpText, IsAssetizable, ConfigureDuringSale, IsSoldOnlyWithOtherProds, SpecificationType, DecompositionScope, FulfillmentQtyCalcMethod, UsageModelType FROM Product2

Products & Bundles.name: Product Attributes (Runtime)
Products & Bundles.query: SELECT Name, AttributeNameOverride, DefaultValue, IsHidden, IsReadOnly, IsRequired, Status, Product2.StockKeepingUnit, AttributeDefinition.Code, ProductClassificationAttribute.AttributeCategory.Code, ProductClassificationAttribute.AttributeDefinition.Code, ProductClassificationAttribute.ProductClassification.Code, AttributeCategory.Code, IsPriceImpacting, Sequence, DisplayType, StepValue FROM ProductAttributeDefinition

Products & Bundles.name: Bundle Component Groups
Products & Bundles.description: Groups of components in bundle products (min/max rules)
Products & Bundles.query: SELECT Name, ParentProduct.StockKeepingUnit, MinBundleComponents, MaxBundleComponents, Description, Sequence, Code FROM ProductComponentGroup

Products & Bundles.name: Bundle Components (Related Products)
Products & Bundles.description: Child products in bundles with quantity, required flags, selling models, sequence, etc.
Products & Bundles.query: SELECT Name, ChildProduct.StockKeepingUnit, ChildProductClassification.Code, ParentProduct.StockKeepingUnit, Quantity, ParentSellingModel.Name, ChildSellingModel.Name, Sequence, DoesBundlePriceIncludeChild, QuantityScaleMethod, MaxQuantity, MinQuantity, ProductComponentGroup.Code, IsComponentRequired, IsQuantityEditable, IsDefaultComponent, ProductRelationshipType.Name, QuoteVisibility FROM ProductRelatedComponent

Catalog & Categories.name: Product Catalogs
Catalog & Categories.description: Product catalogs with validity dates and type
Catalog & Categories.query: SELECT Name, Code, CatalogType, Description, EffectiveEndDate, EffectiveStartDate FROM ProductCatalog

Catalog & Categories.name: Product Categories
Catalog & Categories.description: Category hierarchy in catalogs (with parent and referenced product)
Catalog & Categories.query: SELECT Name, Catalog.Code, Description, SortOrder, IsNavigational, Code, ParentCategory.Code, ReferencedProduct__r.ProductCode, IsDisplayedConfigurator__c FROM ProductCategory

Catalog & Categories.name: Products in Categories
Catalog & Categories.description: Many-to-many link: which products belong to which category in which catalog
Catalog & Categories.query: SELECT ProductCategory.Code, Product.StockKeepingUnit, Catalog.Code FROM ProductCategoryProduct

Pricing & Selling Models.name: Pricebooks
Pricing & Selling Models.description: Standard and custom pricebooks with validity
Pricing & Selling Models.query: SELECT Name, IsActive, Description, ValidFrom, ValidTo FROM Pricebook2

Pricing & Selling Models.name: Selling Models
Pricing & Selling Models.description: Evergreen, Term, One-Time, etc. with pricing term
Pricing & Selling Models.query: SELECT Name, SellingModelType, PricingTerm, PricingTermUnit, Status FROM ProductSellingModel

Pricing & Selling Models.name: Proration Policies
Pricing & Selling Models.description: How partial periods are handled in subscriptions
Pricing & Selling Models.query: SELECT Name, ProrationPolicyType, RemainderStrategy, ArePartialPeriodsAllowed FROM ProrationPolicy

Pricing & Selling Models.name: Product ↔ Selling Model Assignment
Pricing & Selling Models.description: Which selling model (and proration) applies to each product
Pricing & Selling Models.query: SELECT ProductSellingModel.Name, Product2.StockKeepingUnit, ProrationPolicy.Name, IsDefault FROM ProductSellingModelOption

Pricing & Selling Models.name: Pricebook Entries
Pricing & Selling Models.description: Prices per Pricebook + Product + Selling Model
Pricing & Selling Models.query: SELECT IsActive, UnitPrice, UseStandardPrice, ProductSellingModel.Name, Product2.StockKeepingUnit, Pricebook2.Name FROM PricebookEntry
